price: Watapata humo kila namna ya matunda na watapata kila watakacho kitaka.
arabic: لَهُمۡ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٞ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ
footnotes: Wao na wake zao wamo katika vivuli vilivyo enea, wameegemea juu ya viti vilivyo pambwa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: lahum fīhā fākihatun walahum mā yaddaʿūna
